overview:
Bullfrog Builders is a full-service, multi-dimensional construction firm with a highly forward-thinking and creative approach to the industry. Its diverse works encompass construction, remodeling, design, and finance to serve the New York metropolitan area as well as Westchester and Long Island.

The founders, Dino Andreakos and Constantine Rigas, are lifelong friends who grew up together in Queens and are energetic self-starters who have been working in the business together for nearly two decades. Combined they have an unparalleled, in-depth and personal understanding of clients ranging from first-time homeowners to commercial businesses.

Every Bullfrog Builders project results in polished work from the best craftsmen who are experts in their trade. Each project begins with a personal consulting session to discern clients’ ideal vision and budget. Attention to detail and customer satisfaction are priorities from start to finish.

video_embeds.description: Bullfrog Builders Carefully Removes Brick Wall to Install Sliding Doors
